sentences.en: a luscious and fragrant dessert wine
sentences.cn: 甘甜芳香的餐后葡萄酒
他沉浸在悦耳的乐曲中.
他很喜欢吃那种香甜的水果.

sentences.en: I like the luscious taste of ripe peaches.
Imogen, turning her luscious glance from one to the other of the old dears ', only smiled.
sentences.cn: 伊摩根明媚的眼光先把这个看看,又把那个看看--两个“老宝贝 ” -- 只是微笑.
柔软光滑的丝绸和天鹅绒

sentences.en: Plate heart draw baby play picture a luscious, vivid description.
sentences.cn: 碟心绘婴戏图,人物生动传神, 底书“大清雍正年”六字青花楷书款.
她是个迷人的金发女郎.

sentences.en: She was looking luscious in a flannel shirt.
sentences.cn: 她穿着法兰绒裙子,看上去楚楚动人.

sentences.en: Sime is not thirty years old, and Madeline's a luscious girl.
sentences.cn: 西姆还不到三十岁, 梅德琳又是个娇艳的姑娘.

sentences.en: The luscious Miss Wharton gave me a demure but knowing smile.
sentences.cn: 性感迷人的沃顿小姐对我羞涩地会心一笑。

sentences.en: The watermelon was very luscious. Everyone wanted another slice.
sentences.cn: 西瓜很可口, 每个人都想再来一片.

sentences.en: There's a luscious young tomato working in our office.
sentences.cn: 我们办公室有个性感又漂亮的女孩.

sentences.en: This slice of luscious silky - smooth cheesecake comes topped with delicious raspberry sauce.
sentences.cn: 这小片美味的丝滑起司蛋糕上面点缀着可口的覆盆子酱. 让你欲罢不能.

sentences.en: Waiting, getting chance, the dirty trick , is also the most luscious.
sentences.cn: 等待, 有机会, 最坏, 也最甜美.

sentences.en: What I like most about Gabby is her luscious lips!
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢的是盖比那性感饱满的双唇！

trans.tran_cn: 美味的，满足感官的，过分甜美的，腻人的，十分性感的
trans.tran_en: extremely good to eat or drink
